eu_initiatives: Organizing Experience Exchange Meetings of all Notified Bodies under MDD, AIMD, and IVDD
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: EXPERT GROUP ON NEW & EMERGING TECHNOLOGIES#E03230#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3230#Member#C#Vigilance Medical Devices Experts Group #E01308#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1308#Member#C#Working Group on European Databank on Medical Devices#E01309#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1309#Member#C#Classification and Borderline Expert Group#E01306#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1306#Member#C#Working Group on Clinical Investigation and Evaluation #E01576#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1576#Member#C
goals__remit:
Forum to provide experience exchange for the Notified Bodies related to Medical Devices with the goals: 
a) to support the coordination of the notified bodies to harmonize  the procedures for conformity assessments 
b) to establish NB-Med as a representative body 
c) to ensure communication with the commission, authorities and stakeholders 
d) to support scientific working groups on European level
relevant_communication:
- Medical Device Regulation (MDR) 
- In-Vitro-Diagnostic Regulation (IVDR) 
- Several scientific working groups
